<h1 align="center">
  Gatsby Blog - CK Devlog
</h1>

Gatsby 기반으로 제작한 기록 블로그

## 🚀 Develop

1.  **Install packages.**

    ```shell
    npm install
    ```

1.  **Start develop server.**

    ```shell
    gatsby develop
    npm run develop
    ```
    
    Your site is now running at `http://localhost:8000`!

1.  **Deploy to github.**

    ```shell
    npm run deploy
    ```
